name: SENIOR CITIZENS LOBBY
description: Support the reform of Social Security on behalf of America's senior citizens.
sampleDescriptions: Support reforms of social security to ensure all seniors get the benefits they have worked so hard to earn. Support other minor issues that directly impact the financial stability of senior citizens.
social security issues related to preserving current payments and ensuring a strong future for the program
